name: Street Soccer
description:
Inspiration

Casual Mobile Games i.e  ZigZag. Why i avoid Levels.? The Casual and endless mode of Play always Relieves any burden on Mind and let the user play without having his prolong attention.

Game Play

Just Click to move the Ball in anti direction of 45 degree. Dodge the Obstacles and Collect the Soccer.  Go unless you get Tired.

Controls

Left Mouse Button
